result.html: An iomarca cainteToo much talk!
result.ponchtml: An iomarca cainteToo much talk!

result.eng: There are too many advertisements on television.
result.ga: Bíonn an iomarca fógraí ar an teilifís
result.orig: Bíonn an iomarca fógraí ar an teilifís
result.html: Bíonn an iomarca fógraí ar an teilifísThere are too many advertisements on television.
result.ponchtml: Bíonn an iomarca fógraí ar an teilifísThere are too many advertisements on television.

result.eng: You spend too much money on drink.
result.ga: Caitheann tú an iomarca airgid ar an deoch
result.orig: Caitheann tú an iomarca airgid ar an deoch
result.html: Caitheann tú an iomarca airgid ar an deochYou spend too much money on drink.
result.ponchtml: Caiṫeann tú an iomarca airgid ar an deoċYou spend too much money on drink.

result.eng: We have lost too mich time.
result.ga: Tá an iomarca ama caillte againn
result.orig: Tá an iomarca ama caillte againn
result.html: Tá an iomarca ama caillte againnWe have lost too mich time.
result.ponchtml: Tá an iomarca ama caillte againnWe have lost too mich time.

result.eng: Well, the television is the problem then, unless you are spending too much time in the shower!
result.ga: Bhuel is í an teilifís an fhadhb mar sin mura bhfuil tú ag caitheamh an iomarca ama sa gcithfholcadh
result.orig: Bhuel is í an teilifís an fhadhb mar sin mura bhfuil tú ag caitheamh an iomarca ama sa gcithfholcadh
result.html: Bhuel is í an teilifís an fhadhb mar sin mura bhfuil tú ag caitheamh an iomarca ama sa gcithfholcadhWell, the television is the problem then, unless you are spending too much time in the shower!
result.ponchtml: Ḃuel is í an teilifís an ḟaḋb mar sin mura ḃfuil tú ag caiṫeaṁ an iomarca ama sa gciṫḟolcaḋWell, the television is the problem then, unless you are spending too much time in the shower!

result.html: Bhí an iomarca tráchta annThere was too much traffic.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí an iomarca tráċta annThere was too much traffic.

result.eng: I wouldn't like to put you under too much pressure.
result.ga: Níor mhaith liom an iomarca brú a chur ort
result.orig: Níor mhaith liom an iomarca brú a chur ort
result.html: Níor mhaith liom an iomarca brú a chur ortI wouldn't like to put you under too much pressure.
result.ponchtml: Níor ṁaiṫ liom an iomarca brú a ċur ortI wouldn't like to put you under too much pressure.
